allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add dispatch management features with issue dismissal and item removal

- Add API endpoints for dismissing issues and removing items from dispatch
- Enhance dispatch report page with improved functionality
- Update inventory checker and status widget
- Improve FollowUpModal and RolePreviewBanner components

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix type error: stringify productionDates array for SQL insert

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
